ARABIC: ٱنطَلِقُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Proceed to that which you denied!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Go to what you used to deny;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Proceed now towards that which you were wont to deny as false;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Proceed to that (the Day of Judgment) which you have rejected.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Move towards what you used to deny!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (It will be said to the disbelievers): "Depart you to that which you used to deny!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Walk on to that which you called a lie.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Depart to that you cried was lies!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (It will be said unto them:) Depart unto that (doom) which ye used to deny;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Proceed to that which you denied.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Depart Unto that which ye were wont to belie.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: [The faithless will be told:] ‘Proceed toward what you used to deny!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (It will be said:) "Depart ye to that which ye used to reject as false!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (It will be said to the disbelievers): "Depart you to that which you used to deny!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Depart to that which you belied!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “Proceed to what you used to deny.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [They will be told], "Proceed to that which you used to deny.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [77:29] And on the Day of Resurrection it will be said to the deniers: Depart to that, chastisement, which you used to deny!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Depart) repudiators (unto that (doom) which ye used to deny) in the life of the world, claiming that it will never take place;
